title: Google Fiber now offers Business 2 Gig plan for $250/month as 1 Gig drops to $100
content:
Over the course of last year, Google Fiber rolled out its 2 Gig plan to many more cities, and it’s now coming to business customers for $250/month. 

more…

The post Google Fiber now offers Business 2 Gig plan for $250/month as 1 Gig drops to $100 appeared first on 9to5Google.
